title: List of Real Madrid CF managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The most successful coach with Real Madrid is Carlo Ancelotti, as won 15 titles with the team. Ancelotti, in two spells, won La Liga twice, Copa del Rey twice, UEFA Champions League three times, Spanish Super Cup twice, UEFA Super Cup three ...

title: 2025–26 Real Madrid CF season - Wikipedia
snippet: On 22 May, Madrid announced the departure of the club captain Luka Modrić after 13 years in the club, who left as Real's most decorated player, having won 28 trophies. On 23 May, Madrid and Carlo Ancelotti announced their mutual decision to part ways after the conclusion of the 2024–25 La ...

title: Xabi Alonso named new Real Madrid coach
snippet: Xabi Alonso (Tolosa, 25/11/1981) is Real Madrid's new coach. The 43-year-old Spanish manager returns to the club where he clinched six trophies as a player to become a madridista legend.

title: Alonso confirmed as new Real Madrid coach

title: Xabi Alonso - Wikipedia
snippet: Alonso was named head coach of Bayer Leverkusen in 2022 and completed an unprecedented unbeaten domestic double in 2024, winning the club's first ever Bundesliga title and first DFB-Pokal since 1993. After two-and-a-half years with the German side, Alonso was appointed as the new head coach of his former club Real Madrid in June 2025.
